sentences.en: A stanza is, literally, a room.
Dad was literally blazing with anger.

sentences.cn: 他逐字逐句地翻译这段文字.

sentences.en: I literally crawled to the car.
sentences.cn: 我真的是爬到车那边去的。

sentences.en: I said I felt like quitting, but I didn’t mean it literally (= I did not mean exactly what I said )!
sentences.cn: 我是说我不想干了，但并不是真的不干了！

sentences.en: I saw five cop cars pull into the driveway. And I literally freaked.
sentences.cn: 我看到5辆警车开进了我家的车道。我简直吓坏了。

sentences.en: If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
sentences.cn: 如果把我们能做到的都做了，最终连我们自己都会被吓到。

sentences.en: She was literally blue with cold.
The event literally stopped the traffic.
sentences.cn: 这一事件几乎让交通陷于停顿。

sentences.en: The name of the cheese is Dolcelatte, literally meaning ‘sweet milk’.
sentences.cn: 这种奶酪名叫Dolcelatte，字面意思是 “甜牛奶” 。

sentences.en: The Olympic Games were watched by literally billions of people.
sentences.cn: 奥运会确确实实有几十亿人观看。

sentences.en: The sentence cannot be literally rendered.

sentences.cn: 景色美得简直让人窒息。
volk这个单词直译过来为folk（人们）。

sentences.en: To see my body literally wither away before my eyes was exasperating.
sentences.cn: 眼见自己的身体日渐衰弱真是让人心烦。

sentences.en: We've got to get the economy under control or it will literally eat us up.
sentences.cn: 我们必须设法控制经济，不然它非把我们吞噬了不可。

sentences.en: Windsor Castle is quite literally an antique treasure trove.
sentences.cn: 温莎城堡确实是名副其实的古物宝藏。
